price: 29. Ceux qui ont mécru diront : « Seigneur, montre-nous ceux qui nous ont fourvoyés parmi les djinns et les hommes, pour que nous les foulions aux pieds et qu’ils soient au plus bas (de l’Enfer) ! »
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ رَبَّنَآ أَرِنَا ٱلَّذَيۡنِ أَضَلَّانَا مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ نَجۡعَلۡهُمَا تَحۡتَ أَقۡدَامِنَا لِيَكُونَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَسۡفَلِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū rabbanā arinā alladhayni aḍallānā mina al-jini wal-insi najʿalhumā taḥta aqdāminā liyakūnā mina al-asfalīna
